name: Ai Farming Analysis
desc: A backend AI-powered farming analysis system with database integrety that evaluates temperature, moisture, and water needs to recommend optimal crops for cultivation.

name: Online Quiz System
desc: An intuitive Online Quiz System built in Java (using AWT/Swing) that delivers a multiple-choice quiz with instant scoring and a detailed performance report.

name: Book Finding Website
desc: A simple Java-based Book Management System using Swing that allows users to add, view, and delete books with a clean graphical interface.

name: Path Finder Algorithms
desc: A visual pathfinding simulator using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas to demonstrate algorithms like A, Dijkstra, and BFS in real-time.

name: Discord Music Bot
desc: Discord Bot using Python , ffmpeg music enhancements and easy to control which plays high quality music from youtube and spotify which you can lsiten and enjoy.

name: Stone Paper Scissor Game
desc: A web-based Rock Paper Scissors game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive UI and score tracking.
